data.actual_result: It only changes in chat / when you press the avatar
data.expected_result: It changes in display and chat
data.short_description: When someone changes the username while your in DM with the person, the username doesn't changes in display, only in chat. https://imgur.com/a/r18hK
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a person - Tell the person to change the username while your in dm
